bug.author: vfdev-5
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
A bug with the content of the Outputs tab. I run an experiment, say n35, in my code I create my log.txt file, which become visible in the output of the experiment which is permanently filled. Then I run another experiment and in the Outputs tab I see my log.txt file and other files. But job is not yet scheduled. In the content of the log.txt I see the content of the previous log.txt, experiment 35. <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
Polyaxon 0.3.1 GKE

comments.comment: The reducers has much better state management, and this is fixed as a side effect of this new behavior.
